item.title: Preprocessing for Audio Classification: Trimming Silence
item.description: Code for this post can be found here. I recently encountered an interesting problem while working on a system that can detect cat meows in a real-time audio stream. One of the critical components in this system is a machine learning model that can take in audio data and classify it as containing a meow or not. To train the model, I need a bunch of audio clips of meows and a bunch of clips of not-meow sounds.
